info.description:
Ken and Jeff fly in to one of the many small private islands in Canada across the lake from Michigan every August for one week. They've been doing it since they graduated college ten years ago. Both are single and have remained best friends.

Ken is 32 years old, 6'2", 210 pounds of hunky muscle with a furry body, flat top, and porn stache. He is gay and has secretly pined for Jeff over the years.
